name: find_international_flights
description: Find top international flight options, presenting airline, price, and departure time.

origin.description: IATA code or name of departure city or airport

destination.description: IATA code or name of arrival city or airport

return_date.description: Return date in YYYY-MM-DD format; include for round-trip searches

passengers.description: Number of passengers searching for flights

max_results.description: Maximum number of top flight results to display
